value:
$WmMPID_パイソン,ch10_22_Python_M_Normal,Face|Look, I'm not like other folks.
I don't like chasing wildly after
some dream.$k$pDreams don't fill the belly,
and they sure don't pay for
life's other comforts.$k$p$WmMPID_フォルス,ch10_21_Forsyth_M_Normal,Face|Well, that sounds utterly depressing,
but if you're happy, I'll let it be.$k$p$Sbs1000|
